description:
cmd/ld: wrap long data lines in -a output

Also move symbol names onto lines by themselves: some are very long.
Show relocations.

messages.text:
Hello ken2 (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=8377d19921c3 ***

cmd/ld: wrap long data lines in -a output

Also move symbol names onto lines by themselves: some are very long.
Show relocations.

R=ken2
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7689043

subject: code review 7689043: cmd/ld: wrap long data lines in -a output
